name: Bitfinity 2077: Hidden Wallet
description:
This game is an attempt to show how the unstable cryptocurrency market is structured, very risky, where very little depends on the ordinary person. Even if you are doing well now, things can change very quickly.

Feel yourself in the role of a small bitcoin, which life is very difficult! VERY. DIFFICULT.

Bad news can destroy you. And not only them!

Do you think the good one will help you? NOPE.
...or, maybe, only for the first time.

Do you want to relax and grow up quietly? AS IT WILL NOT BE SO!
Altcoins everywhere! ETHEREUM, MONERO, DASH, ZCASH, RIPPLE... All of them want be first at cryptocurrency throne!

And... you know something about hackers?  BUT THEY KNOW ABOUT YOU EVERYTHING! 

Do you want to cost 1 000 000$? 
HAH. TRY.

...and you find more hints after 10000$ price
